Sliver of Meat.name: Sliver of Meat
description: A slice of thinly carved beast flesh.
Material used for crafting items.
Found by hunting herbivorous beasts.
The dried meat toughens the constitution.

Beast Liver.name: Beast Liver
description: The fresh liver of a beast; a luscious fruit of life.
Material used for crafting items.
Found by hunting herbivorous beasts.
Dried liver boosts damage negation.

Lump of Flesh.name: Lump of Flesh
description: A lump of beast flesh filled with rich juices.
Material used for crafting items.
Found by hunting carnivorous beasts.
Meat suitable for a rustic feast.

Beast Blood.name: Beast Blood
description: Fresh beast blood, glinting with gold.
Material used for crafting items.
Found by hunting carnivorous beasts.
This glimmering blood never rots or decays.

Old Fang.name: Old Fang
description: A rarely-seen specimen of beast fang.
Material used for crafting items.
Found by hunting carnivorous beasts.
These multiple, overlapping fangs grow from a single root. Perhaps they're a vestige of the primordial crucible.

Budding Horn.name: Budding Horn
description: A rarely-seen specimen of a young, budding horn.
Material used for crafting items.
Found by hunting herbivorous beasts.
This horn began to sprout on a beast that typically bears no horn. Perhaps it's a vestige of the primordial crucible.

Flight Pinion.name: Flight Pinion
description: Flight feather of birds.
Material used for crafting items.
Commonly used for arrow fletchings.

Four-Toed Fowl Foot.name: Four-Toed Fowl Foot
description: A four-toed fowl's foot.
Material used for crafting items.
In the Lands Between, having three digits is seen as a bad omen. As such, the four-toed fowl's foot is a gift of great luck indeed.

Turtle Neck Meat.name: Turtle Neck Meat
description: A splendid, lengthy cut of turtle neck meat.
Material used for crafting items.
Considered an especially nutritious ingredient In the south of the Lands Between.

Human Bone Shard.name: Human Bone Shard
description: Fragment of bone with dun mottling.
Material used for crafting items.
Found by hunting Those Who Live in Death.
Lamentably brittle, it crumbles at the lightest caress.
Human Bone Shard.hint: Found by hunting Those Who Live in Death

Great Dragonfly Head.name: Great Dragonfly Head
description: Head of a large dragonfly.
Material used for crafting items.
Long believed to have the ability to neutralize poisons.

Slumbering Egg.name: Slumbering Egg
description: Owl eggs that will never hatch.
Material used for crafting items.
Prized as a symbol of the most sublime slumber.

Crab Eggs.name: Crab Eggs
description: Eggs of large crabs which dwell in the shallows.
Material used for crafting items.
A nutritious foodstuff that warms from within.
The flavor is exquisite.
Only those of comfort and means know the truth:
a crab's eggs are more delectable than its meat.

Land Octopus Ovary.name: Land Octopus Ovary
description: Puffy, milky white ovary of a land octopus.
Material used for crafting items.
Land octopuses eat humans in order to bear young, and theirs is the blood that runs through these ovaries.

Miranda Powder.name: Miranda Powder
description: Pollen from a man-eating miranda flower.
Material used for crafting items.
Throughout history, perfumers have prized this extremely fragrant form of miranda pollen, not yet scattered into the air.

Strip of White Flesh.name: Strip of White Flesh
description: Thin strips of flesh taken from a bloodless creature.
Material used for crafting items.
The dried meat toughens the constitution, boosting resistance. It's known for its long-lasting effect.

Thin Beast Bones.name: Thin Beast Bones
description: Thin, hard beast bones.
Material used for crafting items.
Found by hunting beasts.
Commonly used to make disposable weapons.

Hefty Beast Bone.name: Hefty Beast Bone
description: Thick, solid beast bones.
Material used for crafting items.
Found by hunting particularly large beasts.
Commonly used to make disposable weapons.
Hefty Beast Bone.hint: Found by hunting particularly large beasts

String.name: String
description: Boasting no special qualities, this is merely a goodly length of string.
Material used for crafting items.
Often carried by demi-humans.
Used to make certain items easier to use.

Living Jar Shard.name: Living Jar Shard
description: A fragment of a living jar, hardened after its death.
Material used for crafting items.
Such fragments command a high price due to the magical power locked within. This leaves the living jars unfortunate targets for poachers.

Albinauric Bloodclot.name: Albinauric Bloodclot
description: The thick, coagulated blood of the Albinaurics.
Material used for crafting items.
Albinaurics are lifeforms made by human hands.
Thus, many believe them to live impure lives, untouched by the Erdtree's grace.

Stormhawk Feather.name: Stormhawk Feather
description: A feather from a hawk that lived as one with the storms.
Material used for crafting items.
These feathers, enveloped in swirling winds, are often used for arrow fletching.

Poisonbloom.name: Poisonbloom
description: Flower that grows in toxic terrain.
Material used for crafting items.
Dripping with a deep-green poisonous liquid.

Trina's Lily.name: Trina's Lily
description: A light-purple water lily that is on the verge of wilting.
Material used for crafting items.
Exceedingly rare to find.
A symbol of faith in St. Trina.
Dulls the senses, preventing agitation.

Fulgurbloom.name: Fulgurbloom
description: Yellow flower that grows in lightning-struck lands.
Material used for crafting items.
Imbued with traces of lightning's essence.

Miquella's Lily.name: Miquella's Lily
description: A delicate water lily of unalloyed gold that has started to fade and wilt.
Material used for crafting items.
Exceedingly rare to find.
A flower signifying faith in the Haligtree.
Thought to be beloved by the Empyrean Miquella in his youth.

Grave Violet.name: Grave Violet
description: A purple flower that blooms in graveyards.
Material used for crafting items.
The hue of ghostflame, it's believed to be useful in calling forth spirits.

Faded Erdleaf Flower.name: Faded Erdleaf Flower
description: An Erdleaf flower that has faded to a pale scarlet, found blooming in rotten lands.
Material used in crafting items.
Said to be fed by leaves that fell from the Erdtree in days of antiquity.

Erdleaf Flower.name: Erdleaf Flower
description: A dusky yellow flower that has started to fade to brown, found throughout the Lands Between.
Material used for crafting items.
Said to be fed by leaves that fell from the Erdtree in days of antiquity.

Altus Bloom.name: Altus Bloom
description: A golden-tinged flower from a succulent plant that blooms on the Altus Plateau.
Material used for crafting items.
Said to be a funereal flower in an era long past, before the Erdtree grew.

Fire Blossom.name: Fire Blossom
description: A half-ashen and smoldering flower that blooms on the Mountaintops of the Giants.
Material used for crafting items.
Fertilized by the sparks from the forge at the peak where burns the flame of ruin.
Fire Blossom.hint: Blooms on the Mountaintops of the Giants

Golden Sunflower.name: Golden Sunflower
description: A golden sunflower that grows facing the Erdtree.
Material used for crafting items.
Found near Minor Erdtrees.
At the foot of the Erdtree, they retain their color, along with a powerful holy essence.

Tarnished Golden Sunflower.name: Tarnished Golden Sunflower
description: A large flower that blooms facing the Erdtree.
Material used for crafting items.
Found near Minor Erdtrees.
Though wilted and faded, it still retains holy essence.

Herba.name: Herba
description: Evergreen leaves that give off a faint light.
Material used for crafting items.
This very common medicinal plant can be found in thickets and elsewhere.

Arteria Leaf.name: Arteria Leaf
description: Dark red leaves with thick, swollen veins.
Material used for crafting items.
Exceedingly rare to find.
A faint pulse can be felt in the veins.
Stirs the blood, providing an enlivening effect.

Dewkissed Herba.name: Dewkissed Herba
description: A herb that grows in the false night in and around the Eternal City.
Material used for crafting items.
Soaked in arcane dew, it gives off the faint glow of starlight.
Dewkissed Herba.hint: Found in and around the Eternal City

Rowa Fruit.name: Rowa Fruit
description: Berry-like red fruits that grow in shrubs.
Material used for crafting items.
Easily found everywhere in the Lands Between, it has a wide variety of uses.
Rowa Fruit.hint: Easily found everywhere in the Lands Between

Golden Rowa.name: Golden Rowa
description: A Rowa fruit tinted with gold.
Material used for crafting items.
Easily found near the Erdtree.

Rimed Rowa.name: Rimed Rowa
description: A berry-like fruit, thought to be the original strain of Rowa.
Material used for crafting items.
Found in frigid highlands.
This hardy species takes root even when frozen solid.

Bloodrose.name: Bloodrose
description: Blood-slick roses that bloom in blood-soaked soil.
Material used for crafting items.
Particularly beloved by those who serve the Lord of Blood. Glory to his inevitable reign.

Eye of Yelough.name: Eye of Yelough
description: A shrub fruit bursting with ripened pulp.
Material used for crafting items.
Grown in lands afflicted by frenzy, it's used for its pain-relieving properties... Though it's also known to be a dangerous intoxicant.
Eye of Yelough.hint: Grown in lands afflicted by frenzy

Crystal Bud.name: Crystal Bud
description: A young plant, crystalized before it could mature.
Material used for crafting items.
Widely found in Liurnia Lake.

Rimed Crystal Bud.name: Rimed Crystal Bud
description: A young plant, frozen into a crystal before it could mature. Material used for crafting items.
Widely found in cold regions.

Sacramental Bud.name: Sacramental Bud
description: An immature bud containing fresh blood.
Material used for crafting items.
Believed to originate long ago from a strain of buds cultivated with youthful, sacramental blood.

Mushroom.name: Mushroom
description: A fungal growth that thrives in damp thickets and elsewhere. Material used for crafting items.
Its thick, spongy flesh makes it a key component in throwing pots.
Mushroom.hint: Thrives in damp thickets and elsewhere

Melted Mushroom.name: Melted Mushroom
description: A mushroom that grows in the false night in and around the Eternal City.
Material used for crafting items.
It drips with a viscous fluid that behaves much like oil.
Melted Mushroom.hint: Found in and around the Eternal City

Toxic Mushroom.name: Toxic Mushroom
description: A mushroom covered in toxic mold that grows in rotten lands. Material used for crafting items.
A skilled hand can repurpose its toxic mold into an effective ward against scarlet rot.

Root Resin.name: Root Resin
description: Resin secreted from the roots of the Greattree.
Can also be found near trees on the surface.
Material used in crafting items.
The roots of the Greattree were once linked to those of the Erdtree, or so they say, and it is for this reason catacombs are built around Greattree roots.
Root Resin.hint:
Secreted from the roots of the Greattree.
Can also be found near trees on the surface.

Cracked Crystal.name: Cracked Crystal
description: A cracked, impure, degraded, and altogether unremarkable crystal.
Material used for crafting items.
Widely found in crystal tunnels.

Sanctuary Stone.name: Sanctuary Stone
description: A rare piece of stone fragment found near places where ruins have fallen from the sky.
Material used for crafting items.
It feeds and strengthens the light as it shines.
Sanctuary Stone.hint: Found near the remains of fallen ruins, but rarely

Nascent Butterfly.name: Nascent Butterfly
description: An arcane butterfly with translucent wings.
Material used for crafting items. Exceedingly rare to find.
This butterfly appears as if it's just emerged from its cocoon for its entire life.

Aeonian Butterfly.name: Aeonian Butterfly
description: A butterfly with withered, scarlet wings found in the Swamp of Aeonia.
Material used for crafting items.
According to myth, these butterflies were once the wings of the Goddess of Rot herself.
Aeonian Butterfly.hint: Found in the Swamp of Aeonia

Smoldering Butterfly.name: Smoldering Butterfly
description: An eternally burning butterfly found near wildfires and elsewhere.
Material used for crafting items.
Serves as the kindling for a number of items.

Silver Firefly.name: Silver Firefly
description: Firefly that gives off a silvery light.
Material used in crafting items.
Found near bodies of cold water untouched by sunlight.
The light of fireflies is believed to have an alluring magic. Silver light is considered to invite riches.
Silver Firefly.hint: Found near cold waters untouched by sunlight

Gold Firefly.name: Gold Firefly
description: Firefly that gives off a golden light.
Material used in crafting items.
Found near bodies of water close to Minor Erdtrees.
The light of fireflies is believed to have an alluring magic. Golden light is considered to invite runes.
Gold Firefly.hint: Found near waters close to Minor Erdtrees

Glintstone Firefly.name: Glintstone Firefly
description: A firefly whose glowing tail has hardened into
glintstone, widely found in Liurnia Lake.
Material used for crafting items.
Alas, now that its tail is glintstone,
it can no longer beguile potential mates.

Golden Centipede.name: Golden Centipede
description: The golden, desiccated remains of a centipede.
Material used for crafting items.
Kept as a fetish by Golden Order fundamentalists, especially the hunters of Those Who Live in Death.
As such, they're found near churches and similar.

Silver Tear Husk.name: Silver Tear Husk
description: A hardened husk shed by a formless life form known as the Silver Tear, found in and around the Eternal City.
Material used for crafting items.
The Silver Tear makes mockery of life, reborn again and again into imitation.
Perhaps, one day, it will be reborn a lord...
Silver Tear Husk.hint: Found in and around the Eternal City

Gold-Tinged Excrement.name: Gold-Tinged Excrement
description: Someone's excrement. It has a golden tinge.
Material used for crafting items.
Often hidden in woods and thickets.
Gold-tinged excrement is a highly stable substance; it doesn't dry out, nor does it lose its customary warmth or scent. For better or for worse, it remains as it is.
Gold-Tinged Excrement.hint: Often hidden in woods and thickets

Blood-Tainted Excrement.name: Blood-Tainted Excrement
description: The bloody excrement of a carnivorous beast.
Material used for crafting items.
Found in the land of the new dynasty.
Mixed inside with half-digested flesh are dense colonies of tiny eggs of unknown but assuredly revolting origin.
Blood-Tainted Excrement.hint: Found in the land of the new dynasty

Cave Moss.name: Cave Moss
description: Faintly luminescent moss that grows in dark caves.
Material used in crafting items.
A fundamental ingredient for medicinal boluses.
Cave Moss.hint: Gives off pale light in dark caves

Budding Cave Moss.name: Budding Cave Moss
description: Faintly luminescent moss that grows in dark caves, speckled with tiny, yellow flowers.
Material used for crafting items.
It is primarily used in perfumes.
Budding Cave Moss.hint: Gives off pale light in dark caves

Crystal Cave Moss.name: Crystal Cave Moss
description: Faintly luminescent moss that grows in dark caves, laced with fine crystals.
Material used for crafting items.
Among mosses, it possesses unique medicinal properties.
Crystal Cave Moss.hint: Gives off pale light in dark caves

Yellow Ember.name: Yellow Ember
description: An ember taken from the eye socket of a corpse.
Material used for crafting items.
A sign that the deceased suffered from the flame of frenzy. This grape has ripened and burst.
Yellow Ember.hint: Found in lands afflicted by frenzy

Volcanic Stone.name: Volcanic Stone
description: A smoldering rock containing hot gas.
Material used for crafting items.
Found on Mt. Gelmir.

Formic Rock.name: Formic Rock
description: Rock formed from solidified giant ant venom. Highly acidic. Material used for crafting items.
Found near Ainsel River and other places where giant ants live.
Formic Rock.hint: Found near Ainsel River and other places where giant ants live

Gravel Stone.name: Gravel Stone
description: A small clump of sharp, pointed stones.
Material used for crafting items.
Such compound stones, found in lands once beset by ancient dragons, are said to be the scales of those very beasts.
Gravel Stone.hint: Found in lands once beset by ancient dragons
